sleeper.translation[0].definitions[0].de: someone who sleeps in a particular way
sleeper.translation[0].definitions[0].no: heavy sleeper (=someone who does not wake easily)
sleeper.translation[0].definitions[2].de: a heavy piece of wood or concrete that supports a railway track
sleeper.translation[0].definitions[3].de: a night train with carriages that have beds for passengers to sleep in
sleeper.translation[0].definitions[5].de: a bed on a train for a passenger to sleep in
sleeper.translation[0].definitions[6].de: a film, book etc which is successful, even though people did not expect it to be
sleeper.translation[0].definitions[7].de: a piece of clothing for a baby that covers its whole body including its feet
sleeper.translation[0].definitions[8].de: a spy who is sent to a particular place and who lives an ordinary life there until a later time, when they begin their spying activities
sleeper.translation[1].definitions[0].de: a share or a product that is not successful immediately, but then suddenly starts to sell well or be successful
sleeper.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: The movie turned out to be a sleeper.
